subject: Ryder Cup (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: Paul McGinley was chosen as Europe’s Ryder Cup captain for 2014. McGinley, a 46-year-old Irishman, replaces José María Olazábal.
snippet: Paul McGinley was chosen as Europe’s Ryder Cup captain for 2014. McGinley, a 46-year-old Irishman, replaces José María Olazábal.
